title: What is the gangplank bug?
body:
Title

Edit: Yeah did not read the story tell now, hue hue hue.

replies.body:
No bug, everything seemed fine up until the point he died. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/#story-3

But I have spooky Gangplank...
DID HE GET GHOST BUSTED!?

He was hiding his oranges in the Powder Kegs all along.

In retrospect, it was a horrible decision.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ey3JIqx8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T22:30:47.887+0000)
>
> No bug, everything seemed fine up until the point he died. 
> 
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/#story-3

It would seem fitting the those who own Spooky Gangplank be able to play him at this time.
What about the part where Draven can get stacks by using Q on GP's barrels? Isn't this the intended fix for disabling him? -_-
Shouldn’t you still be able to play him with the spooky skin?

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ey3JIqx8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T22:30:47.887+0000)
>
> No bug, everything seemed fine up until the point he died. 
> 
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/#story-3

Oranges make him K. He is alive.
it wasn't a bug, it was a huge explosion.
Hope no one checks the red tracker for discussions about bugs before they go to read the story that was just posted.

Re-enable GP for ranked. You guys shouldn't let lore control the game. He should only be disabled for the new game mode and map. Doing it for ranked is just plain stupid. Good Job Riot you fucked up this time.
But... But the only Gp's I have seen in ranked are the ones who think AP Jungle Gp is a good idea ;n;
His ultimate had a global range i think

> [{quoted}](name=yay sprinkles,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ey3JIqx8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-29T22:24:13.122+0000)
>
> His ultimate had a global range i think

Can not tell if sarcasm.
I have no idea if I should upvote or downvote him. It's such an inane but not wrong statement I can't quite even.
U know, I can't decide either. Do we uphold a genius of confusing sarcasm, or downvote a scrub?
